charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 28 mos.; Recommend BOP-be considered &; if found eligible be placed in Intensive Confinement Center &; if not accepted, be placed in Comprehensive Residential Drug Treatment Program; Supervised Release 3 yrs.; Special Cond.-1) participate in substance abuse treatment program &; submit to urinalysis as directed &; 2) provide USPO w/full financial disclosure as directed; Special Assessment $100 payable immediately; Forfeit-as outlined in Forfeiture Order; Fine waived. (1)

Imprisonment 28 mos.; Recommend BOP-be considered &; if found eligible be placed in Intensive Confinement Center &; if not accepted, be placed in Comprehensive Residential Drug Treatment Program; Supervised Release 3 yrs.; Special Cond.-1) participate in substance abuse treatment program &; submit to urinalysis as directed &; 2) provide USPO w/full financial disclosure as directed; Special Assessment $100 payable immediately; Forfeit-as outlined in Forfeiture Order; Fine waived. (2)
Probation 5 yrs. w/Special Condition to participate in substance abuse treatment program as directed by Probation Ofcr.; Special Assessment $100; Fine $10,000. (1)

Probation 5 yrs.; Special Conditions 1) placed on home detention for 6 mos. commencing on date &; under conditions set by Chief USPO w/Court approval, 2) perform 100 hours of community service, 3) participate in drug &; alcohol testing &; treatment program as directed by USPO &; 4) allow USPO access to or provide full financial disclosure; Special Assessment $100; Forfeit property as outlined in Forfeiture Order. (1)
